extensions.description: BofB is where Bank meets Bitcoin. BofB's vision is to become a transitional platform that will help connect the old banking system with how everyone will bank in the future. Our mission is to help achieve the right to bank to everyone by allowing the entire world to be able to access our platform as long as they can meet the most simple requirement which is wanting to join our platform. KYC and AML will be mandatory but banking should be easy and for everyone in the world. Our main strategy will be to have the strongest presence in the Metaverse.
